content: Say your word Lord I shall be healed
Say it, say it, Oh Lord I shall be healed
I'm not worthy to have You in my soul
Only say Your word, I shall be healed
To the banquet throne of the Holy Lamb
The Lord Jesus is calling me
But I'm not worthy to receive Him
But if He says the word, I shall be healed
I need You, Lord, within me
To give me grace and eternal life
But I'm not worthy to receive Him
But if He says the word, I shall be healed
You gave me, Lord, eternal life
By the mystery of this Holy Feast
But I'm not worthy to receive Him
But if He says the word, I shall be healed
I thank You, Lord, for choosing me
To partake freely of this Holy Meal
But I'm not worthy to receive Him
But if He says the word, I shall be healed
